description: Automatically generates a Relationship between a Contact and another Contact or a Contact and a Contact/Campaign Member based on a custom lookup field.

fields.description: For Auto-Create Relationships based on Campaign Members, the list of Campaign types the automation applies to. This field will be blank for Auto-Create Relationships based on Contacts.
fields.inlineHelpText: Eligible Campaign types for this Campaign Member auto-create. (Will be blank for Contact auto-create)
fields.label: Campaign Types

fields.description: The label of the lookup field that triggers the creation of this Relationship when the field value is updated.
fields.inlineHelpText: The field insert or update that triggers the creation of this Relationship
fields.label: Field

fields.description: The API name of the object (either Contact or CampaignMember) that the custom lookup field is on.
fields.inlineHelpText: The object this Auto-Relationship is associated with
fields.label: Object

fields.description: The Relationship type (referer, family, etc.) to be created between the base object defined in the Object field, and the lookup object.
fields.inlineHelpText: The Relationship type to be created between the base object and the lookup object.  The lookup object will receive the reciprocal Relationship, if one is available.
fields.label: Relationship Type

label: Relationship Auto-Create
